channel.description: Recent content on Levi Tan Ong

item.title: Airtable Expense Logging with Ledger Mode
item.description: Changelog 2019/4/13 My PR implementing ledger-xact-date got accepted, so had to rewrite a bunch. Merged payee and date sections into new xact section. Added utility function to get transaction amount value. Changed implementation of final airtable exporting function to make use of ledger-xact-date and ledger-transaction-amount-value 2019/4/11 First Release Summary Many companies and organizations subsidize certain things like transit, food, and lodging for their employees, provided the latter log these expenses via some system defined by the former.
